description: Change of use from office (Land use Class B1) to residential use (Land Use Class C3) and internal and external alterations, including installation of roof and rooflights, to accommodate 66 residential units (14 studios, 26 one-bedroom, and 25 two-bedroom flats, and 1 three-bedroom flat) with associated car parking and refuse storage
decision_conditions: The amount of affordable housing at 10% would represent and unacceptably low provision that would result in a development that would fail to provide housing choice and achieve mixed and balanced communities as a whole, contrary to section 6 of the National Planning Policy Framework, policies 3.8 and 3.9 of the London Plan (2015), policy 1.2 (a) of the Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policy 3A of the Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
